CopyBackupToRegion.name: CopyBackupToRegion
CopyBackupToRegion.description: Grants permission to create a copy of a backup in the specified region

CreateCluster.name: CreateCluster
CreateCluster.description: Grants permission to create a new AWS CloudHSM cluster

CreateHsm.name: CreateHsm
CreateHsm.description: Grants permission to create a new hardware security module (HSM) in the specified AWS CloudHSM cluster

DeleteBackup.name: DeleteBackup
DeleteBackup.description: Grants permission to delete the specified CloudHSM backup

DeleteCluster.name: DeleteCluster
DeleteCluster.description: Grants permission to delete the specified AWS CloudHSM cluster

DeleteHsm.name: DeleteHsm
DeleteHsm.description: Grants permission to delete the specified HSM

DeleteResourcePolicy.name: DeleteResourcePolicy
DeleteResourcePolicy.description: Grants permission to delete the policy attached to CloudHSM resources

DescribeBackups.name: DescribeBackups
DescribeBackups.description: Grants permission to get information about backups of AWS CloudHSM clusters

DescribeClusters.name: DescribeClusters
DescribeClusters.description: Grants permission to get information about AWS CloudHSM clusters

GetResourcePolicy.name: GetResourcePolicy
GetResourcePolicy.description: Grants permission to get information about the policy attached to a AWS CloudHSM resource

InitializeCluster.name: InitializeCluster
InitializeCluster.description: Grants permission to claim an AWS CloudHSM cluster

ListTags.name: ListTags
ListTags.description: Grants permission to get a list of tags for the specified AWS CloudHSM cluster

ModifyBackupAttributes.name: ModifyBackupAttributes
ModifyBackupAttributes.description: Grants permission to modify attributes for an AWS CloudHSM backup

ModifyCluster.name: ModifyCluster
ModifyCluster.description: Grants permission to modify AWS CloudHSM cluster

PutResourcePolicy.name: PutResourcePolicy
PutResourcePolicy.description: Grants permission to attach a policy to an AWS CloudHSM resource

RestoreBackup.name: RestoreBackup
RestoreBackup.description: Grants permission to restore the specified CloudHSM backup

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to add or overwrite one or more tags for the specified AWS CloudHSM cluster

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove the specified tag or tags from the specified AWS CloudHSM cluster
